description.narrative: External communication, advocacy and partnership on children and adolescent rights is strengthened, which contributes to Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Harnessing Power Of Business And Markets, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Country programme is effectively supported to make the systems accountable to children

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: External communication, advocacy and partnership on children and adolescent rights is strengthened

description.narrative: 2019 was an important year in Tunisia, marked by critical events including the presidential and legislative elections, the launch of the MICS Tunisia 2018 results and the commemoration of the CRC@30. All these events provided significant advocacy opportunities to put children at the centre of communication and advocacy in public and social media. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:21/01/2020

title.narrative: Number of initiatives that engage civil society partners and/or coalitions to advocate together with UNICEF for children
